amendment.description: To permit the Department of Defense and other Federal agencies to enter into reciprocal agreements with fire organizations for emergency medical services, hazardous material containment, and other emergency services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1534 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12590) To permit the Department of Defense and other Federal agencies to enter into reciprocal agreements with fire organizations for emergency medical services, hazardous material containment, and other emergency services.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1534 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine.
